text:
Java Software Architect | VENA SOLUTIONS |TORONTO, CA

Who are we? Check out the awesome work we’re up to at: https://engineering.vena.io

You will be responsible for building Vena’s next generation storage engine, document processing and calculation platform, with focus on platform scalability, performance and security.

We can’t wait to hear from you! Apply at: http://bit.ly/1U2G8Jx
